text: Lasioglossum sulthicum is a species of Hymenoptera from the Halictidae family. The scientific name of this species was first published in 1853 by Smith. This species can be found in Eastern Australia.(2008) Integrated Taxonomic Information System (ITIS) Bee Checklist October 3rd, 2008 ==References== sulthicum Category:Insects described in 1853
title: Lasioglossum sulthicum
